message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a fair start.
Your offer wasn't unreasonable, but I think an even split is the fairest way to go.
I see you want fairness, but I think I can do a bit better than even.
Let's meet in the middle. This seems like a fair compromise.
I'm willing to compromise, but 45 is too low. Let's try this.
This is a game of give and take, Alice.  I'm moving closer to your number, hoping you'll do the same.
I see you're moving closer, I'll meet you halfway... kind of.
Alice, we're running out of time. This is my final offer - take it or leave it.
